Sequence Information.Peptide Name: F1 (Rattusin N-terminal fragment 1-8, synthetic AMPs, Arg-rich, UCLL1c, XXA)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence truncation, defensin fragment, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature.Author: Park G, Yun H, Min HJ, Lee CW. 2024
Literature.Title: A Novel Dimeric Short Peptide Derived from alpha-Defensin-Related Rattusin with Improved Antimicrobial and DNA-Binding Activities

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (41.67%) toKR-12RR: 38%, L: 25%, V=T=Q: 13%.Activity: active against active against E. coli (MIC 67 ug/ml) and S.aureus (MIC >500 ug/ml).
